name: Levitate
description:
Levitate is Sailaway Entertainment's first official video game title!  It was created by solo developer Hector Rodriguez.

Objective: Collect 10 Spray cans before time runs out!

Donations will be deposited to CDC Foundation.

https://give4cdcf.org/?utm_source=CDCF&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=combat-corona...

Controls:

Move Right - Up button or 'W' key

Move Left - Down button or 'S' key

Back Flip - Hold Left button or hold  'A' key

Jump - Spacebar

Exit Game - Esc key

Tip:  If you find that the character is struggling to pick up speed, try jumping once to re-activate the hoverboard's engine.
